Looks like the document provider has returned a null document for an editor 
input (which is valid). Is this reliably reproduceable, and is it critical?

Unfortunately (for us), it is reliably reproducible. We have a bug in CDT when 
the document provider returns null. It is not critical, but I thought it would 
be better to report it, because, as you mentioned, this situation is valid.
Fixed in InstructionPointerManager. Please verify, Luc.
